content: --कृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} done well or properly. {2} thoroughly done. {3} well-made or constructed. {4} treated with kindness, assisted, befriended. {5} virtuous, righteous, pious. {6} lucky, fortunate. (--तं {1} any good or virtuous act, kindness, favour, service; नादत्ते कस्यचित्पापं कस्यचित्सुकृतं विभुः <ls>Bg. 5. 15</ls>, <ls>Me. 17.</ls> {2} virtue, moral or religious merit; स्वर्गाभिसंधिसुकृतं वंचनामिव मेनिरे <ls>Ku. 6. 47</ls>; तच्चिंत्यमानं सुकृतं तवेति <ls>R. 14. 16.</ls> {3} fortune, auspiciousness. {4} recompense, reward.
